definitions.definition: To open or close in the manner of an iris.
definitions.label_groups: of an aperture , lens , or door

definitions.definition: To cause (something) to shine with the colours of the rainbow; to make iridescent .

main_definition: ( of an aperture , lens , or door ) To open or close in the manner of an iris.
secondary_definitions: ( literary ) To cause (something) to shine with the colours of the rainbow; to make iridescent .
